Title: Relates to requirements for reducing emissions from medium and heavy-duty vehicles
Summary: Enacts an advanced clean fleets law to reduce vehicle emissions for medium- and heavy-duty vehicles.
LawCode: Amd ยง19-0306-b, add ยง19-0306-c, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to enacting the advanced clean fleets law
